Zoho
 
Sprints
 
Management
 
Process
 
This
 
document
 
outlines
 
the
 
complete
 
workflow
 
for
 
managing
 
projects
 
via
 
Zoho
 
Sprints,
 
involving
 
Project
 
Managers
 
(PMs),
 
Developers,
 
Designers,
 
QA,
 
and
 
Content
 
Writers.
 
It
 
ensures
 
standardization,
 
accountability,
 
and
 
transparency
 
across
 
all
 
roles.
